Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Connection Class.

    A connection between two nodes

    Author:
    Christ Leemans

        public Connection(Node start,
          Node end,
          org.pathvisio.core.model.LineType lineType)
        Create a new connection
        Parameters:
        start - the node at the start of the connecting line
        end - the node at the end of the connecting line
        lineType - the type of line connecting the 2 nodes
